attributes.additional_details:
after reading this article in the news of the world (http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/kitten-experiments-cardiff-university-researchers-1156779) im disgusted to read that this inhumane research still goes on in this country and it was funded by taxpayers! I now feel ashamed to be british knowing that my hard earned tax money goes towards this sort of research.

Please could you therefore make it illigal for this sort of testing to be carried out anywhere in the UK.

Thankyou
